headline: Jim Cramer On O’Reilly Automotive (ORLY): “Buy the One That’s Not Going to Stock Split”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Recently Commented On These 12 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where O’Reilly Automotive, Inc.’s (NASDAQ:ORLY) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discussed recently.
